name: The Cavern (itch) (Groovy Grooves Games)
description:
Our adventurer goes on a journey to find who he really is.

Will he find the truth? Will he see the light?

# How to play

Execute the .exe

Your objective is to reach the bonfire.

# Inputs

A,D for move.
W or Space to jump.

SHIFT for running and higher jumps

In case you can't download it from here, check out our release in GitHub

https://github.com/PapaSocrates/The-Cavern/releases
